verses.name: Exodus 26:1
verses.text: Moreover thou shalt make the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twined linen, and blue, and purple, and scarlet: with cherubims of cunning work shalt thou make them.

verses.name: Exodus 26:2
verses.text: The length of one curtain shall be eight and twenty cubits, and the breadth of one curtain four cubits: and every one of the curtains shall have one measure.

verses.name: Exodus 26:3
verses.text: The five curtains shall be coupled together one to another; and other five curtains shall be coupled one to another.
